trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_SEQ_00<tab>Yugiri is uncertain how best to proceed.
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_TODO_00<tab>Find people in distress.
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_TODO_01<tab>Rescue Azami.
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_TODO_02<tab>Obtain yellow flowers.
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_TODO_03<tab>Bring yellow flowers to Azami.
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Azami.
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Yugiri.
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_LYSE_000_000<tab>I've seen these faces before. That same weary hopelessness. It's like I'm back in Ala Gannha...
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_YUGIRI_000_010<tab>Let us not yet lose hope. Though the situation in Namai is bleak, mayhap it is not so elsewhere.

TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_YUGIRI_000_011<tab>I wish to speak with others outside the village. Lyse and I will look for farmers in the paddies to the east. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I ask that you look to the south.
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_YUGIRI_000_012<tab>Surely they cannot all have given in to despair...
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_AZAMI_000_020<tab>Help me, please!
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_POP_MESSAGE<tab>You sense a hostile presence!
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_AZAMI_000_030<tab>Thank you, thank you, thank you! If you hadn't come along, I don't know what I would've done!
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_AZAMI_000_031<tab>What am I doing out here? Oh...looking for flowers. I need some for my parents' graves.
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_AZAMI_000_032<tab>The ones my brother and I usually bring are yellow, because it was my mother's favorite color. You haven't seen any, have you?
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_AZAMI_000_040<tab>If you find any yellow flowers, could you bring them to me? But be careful─my brother says that you have to look out for the vilekin!
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_AZAMI_000_050<tab>Only yellow ones will do. Mother wouldn't have wanted anything else...
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_AZAMI_000_051<tab>Ah! You found some! Thank you so much, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. That's twice you've saved me now!

TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_AZAMI_000_052<tab>Um, if you have some time to spare, maybe you could come with me? I'm sure Mother and Father would want to meet the <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> who showed me such kindness.
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_AZAMI_000_053<tab>We buried them on a cliff to the west of the village. There's a path through the terraces. I'll show you!
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_AZAMI_000_060<tab>We're here! Just give me a moment to put down the flowers, and I'll introduce you...
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_AZAMI_000_061<tab>They loved to meet travelers and hear tales of faraway places. Maybe you could tell them one about your homeland?
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_ISSE_000_062<tab>(-???-)Azami! Azami! Are you there? Azami!
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_ISSE_000_063<tab>What in the─ You should not be here! Get away from my sister!

TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_AZAMI_000_064<tab>Don't be so rude! <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> saved me from monsters, Brother─<var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> even helped me pick flowers for Mother and Father!
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_ISSE_000_065<tab>Go back to the village. Now.
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_AZAMI_000_066<tab>Y-You're scaring me─
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_ISSE_000_067<tab>I said go! Stay inside and lock the door until I return!

TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_ISSE_000_068<tab>...Don't think me ungrateful. My sister is the only family I have. If you saved her, then...thank you. But it changes nothing. I asked you to leave, and now I'm asking you again.

TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_ISSE_000_069<tab>I'm not going to report you to the imperials, or anything stupid like that. But it's too dangerous for you to stay here. So please, I'm begging you─just leave us alone!
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_Q1_000_070<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_A1_000_071<tab>Is that really what you want?
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_A1_000_072<tab>She said your parents were buried here...
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_ISSE_000_073<tab>How many times do I have to tell you!? If they find you here, we're the ones they'll punish! And it'll be a thousand times worse than before!
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_ISSE_000_074<tab>...So she told, did she? Yes. That's right.
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_ISSE_000_075<tab>...My mother and father believed in the rebellion. They left to fight for Lord Kaien. They came home on a cart driven by imperial soldiers.
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_ISSE_000_076<tab>The soldiers demanded that the families of the insurgents present themselves, or else they'd burn the whole village to the ground.
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_ISSE_000_077<tab>So we did. What choice did we have?

TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_ISSE_000_078<tab>They beat us in the village square─with their hands, with sticks, with anything. They kicked us while we lay on the ground, begging for mercy. They made us denounce my mother and father─call them fools, call them traitors. Say they deserved to die.
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_ISSE_000_079<tab>I heard them laugh, but I dared not look up. One leaned close and whispered in my ear what he'd do to my sister if they had to come back.
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_ISSE_000_080<tab>They're gone, but they're never far. All it takes is the wrong word in the wrong ear, and they'll return. And then I'll have to dig another grave. If I'm lucky.
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_ISSE_000_081<tab>Whatever you came here to do, leave us out of it. If you want to fight the imperials, go and fight them on your own.
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_ISSE_000_082<tab>You can't help us. No one can. And this is all we've got. So please─don't take it from us.
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_LYSE_000_090<tab>What's wrong, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Did something happen?
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_YUGIRI_000_100<tab>You are come at a good time, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. We but recently completed our inquiries. What of yours?
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_YUGIRI_000_101<tab>I...I was not aware of these events... The boy, Isse, he told you all of this?
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_YUGIRI_000_102<tab>Such disgraceful, despicable crimes... If I knew the men responsible, I would not hesitate to hunt them down and─
TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_YUGIRI_000_103<tab>Forgive me, that outburst was unbecoming. The more I learn of the imperials' actions in my absence, the more difficult I find it to marshal my emotions...

TEXT_STMBDA318_02494_YUGIRI_000_104<tab>Could Lord Hien have foreseen this? That our people's spirits would be broken so? Though at first I scoffed at his pronouncement, it feels all too possible now that he might resolve to surrender himself...
